question: Gundu Hanumantha Rao, who passed away recently, was associated with which field?
explanation: Gundu Hanumantha Rao (61), the noted Telugu film comedian, has passed away in Hyderabad, Telangana on February 19, 2018. Rao, born in Vijayawada, started his film career with \"Aha Na Pellanta\" in 1987 and acted in around 400 films such as \"Rajendrudu Gajendrudu\" and \"Yamaleela\". He is known for his roles in Pellaniki Premalekha Priyuraliki Subhalekha (1992), Rajendrudu Gajendrudu, Mayalodu, Jodi No.1, Nenu Seetamahalakshmi, Kedi No.1, etc. He acted in over 600 movies in Telugu and is a popular TV artist.
